TableSettings.uniqueName: IdeConnections%23espsSELECT DISTINCT cap.custom_area_property_id, cap.PROPERTY_LABEL, listagg(clsp.level_value, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY clsp.level_value) OVER (PARTITION BY clsp.CUSTOM_AREA_PROPERTY_ID) allsgs from custom_toc ct left join custom_section cs on ct.CUSTOM_TOC_ID = cs.CUSTOM_TOC_ID left join custom_lvl_sect_prop clsp on cs.CUSTOM_SECTION_ID = clsp.CUSTOM_SECTION_ID left join custom_area_property cap on clsp.CUSTOM_AREA_PROPERTY_ID = cap.CUSTOM_AREA_PROPERTY_ID left join custom_level cl on clsp.CUSTOM_LEVEL_ID = cl.CUSTOM_LEVEL_ID WHERE cap.custom_area_property_id in( SELECT custom_area_property_id FROM custom_area_property c WHERE convert(c.PROPERTY_NAME,'US7ASCII') IN ('Host Fee/RMSS Fee') )
